did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: {comma separted list of material formats; end with period.}
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Professional papers and reviews, newspaper clippings, correpondence, and programs for various plays, including Miss Evers' Boys, a play based on the notorious Tuskegee Syphilis Study in the African American male.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor of Theatre Arts and Director of the Cornell Center for Theatre Arts.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Professional papers and reviews, newspaper clippings, correpondence, and programs for various plays, including Miss Evers' Boys, a play based on the notorious Tuskegee Syphilis Study in the African American male.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: David Feldshuh papers, #14-24-3458. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
